_sText: ------------------------ ------------------------ !!!UPDATE!!! THERE WAS AN ISSUE WITH SOME SPAWNPOINTS THIS ISSUE IS NOW FIXED SORRY FOR ANY INCONVENIENCE ------------------------ ------------------------ Map developed by jackennils map information: • features the locations of the first three movies • fully functional traps as seen in the movies • ~ 5500 solids • ~ 34000 faces • ~ 3100 point entities • ~ 300 solid entities • 350+ unique textures • 500+ hours developement time • size: 52,7 MB • visit maps.jackennils.net for more information, screenshots and a HQ video! ----------------------------- Gallery: Click here for more screenshots! ----------------------------- Video: ----------------------------- description: Is anybody out there who doesn't know the SAW movies? Yes? You? OK... here's a short introduction. Jigsaw ist the bad guy. He kidnaps people, puts them in buildings full of deadly traps and plays his game. The goal is to escape and save your life. de_saw brings you all the locations of the first three movies. There's the bathroom (SAW I), Jigsaw's hideout (SAW I), the trap-house (SAW II) and the old warehouse (SAW III). Furthermore all traps you can see in the movies were recreated. They are fully functional and as deadly as in the movies! Because of the huge map size, I highly recommend a bomb timer of at least 40 seconds. ----------------------------- special thanks to: Harry64 for his ice texture saw for his syringe texture T-R-O-N for his skybox texture calum_mm for his vending machine prefab The Freesound Project and Soundsnap.com for their high quality sounds my friends at -=DgN=- for beta testing Bertram02 for choosing the green cup ;-) Mike Durand (VALVE) for fixing the bug in VHE BashoR for helping me with the overview and all the others I forgot ----------------------------- de_saw was developed by a huge fan of the SAW movie series: me It was made to pay tribute to the geniuses at LIONSGATE Films, Twisted Pictures and especially Darren Lynn Bousman, James Wan, Leigh Whannell & Tobin Bell. All trademarks used are properties of their respective owners. SAW I-III © 2004-2006 LIONSGATE Films No copyright infringements intended! ----------------------------- for more information, a HQ video and screenshots visit maps.jackennils.net! ----------------------------- Have fun!
